function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High level of occupancy in extracurricular activities may lead to increased risk of contagious disease transmission among children.","Impact":"Outbreak of contagious diseases such as flu, cold, or COVID-19 among children, leading to potential health complications and spread to families and communities.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, social distancing measures, and regular disinfection of facilities.
